titles.title: A bill for the relief of certain individuals to settle certain claims filed against the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Courts and Administrative Practice.

bill.summary: 5/10/1988--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay specified sums to creditors of a named bank in full satisfaction of all claims against the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation for failing to disapprove a stock sale transaction which created financial losses for such creditors.
